title: Grim Fairy Tales
description: Ten haunting tales of the ghostly, decadent, and supernatural by Adam Nicke, author of Temptation and Denial.Written in the style of late 19th century masters of the macabre, each weirdly twisting tale is haunted by characters confronting their inner turmoil and the dark recesses of the soul.Escape the modern age and let the lush, sensuous language within these pages wash over you as gently as the crimson hues of twilight on an early Autumn evening.Cult collection back in print after 22 years. Best read by candlelight.
author: Adam Nicke
